Articles.Content:
Building a VTOL craft. Copied the ducted fans via the servo, because it was easier than copying via the fan case. One of them does not work. (It's not always that one and sometimes they both work).

I have Restock and Restock+ and little else, but I am encountering a lot of problems... how can I fix this?

I seems like the servo got stuck already in the SPH. I never had that problem, but I think others had similar problems before. Did you check the different threads here in the BG forums?

P.S. Yes, I know this isn't all that helpful. But maybe more helpful than no answer at all.

Edited January 13, 2020 by AHHans
I'm also having this issue.  And it's also in the SPH.  Getting really tired of it too...  Considering that Squad's known about it for months, I don't know how it isn't fixed yet.
